DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - Determine outcome , term local control , event-free survival , overall survival , child localize unresectable neuroblastoma without MYCN amplification treat carboplatin , etoposide , cyclophosphamide , doxorubicin , vincristine follow surgery . OUTLINE : This multicenter study . Patients receive carboplatin IV 1 hour etoposide IV 2 hour day 1-3 ( course 1 3 ) . Patients receive cyclophosphamide IV 1 hour day 1-5 ( orally day 2 3 ) , doxorubicin IV 6 hour day 4-5 , vincristine IV day 1 5 ( course 2 4 ) . Treatment repeat every 21 day 4 course . Patients undergo surgical resection follow 2 additional course chemotherapy . Patients follow month 8 , 10 , 12 , 16 , 20 , 24 , 30 , 36 , 42 , 48 , 60 . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 100 patient accrue study within 4 year .
